import PropTypes from 'prop-types'; import { formatCurrency, translationHelper } from '../../../helpers'; import { Table, } from "reactstrap" const FacilityDetails = (props) => { const t = translationHelper('financial_report'); // Items const rows = props.items?.map((item) => ( {item.debtor.name} {item.facility.name} {formatCurrency('$', 0, 0)} {item.status} {item.classification} {formatCurrency('$', item.amount)} {formatCurrency('$', item.balance)} {formatCurrency('$', item.share)} {formatCurrency('$', item.capital)} {item.interests}% {formatCurrency('$', item.charges)} {item.refi1} {item.refi2} {item.currentStatus} {item.comments} )); return (
{t("FacilityDetails.Title")}
{rows}
{t("FacilityDetails.Debtor")} {t("FacilityDetails.Facility")} {t("FacilityDetails.Loan")} {t("FacilityDetails.Status")} {t("FacilityDetails.Classification")} {t("FacilityDetails.Amount")} {t("FacilityDetails.Balance")} {t("FacilityDetails.Share")} {t("FacilityDetails.Capital")} {t("FacilityDetails.Interests")} {t("FacilityDetails.Charges")} {t("FacilityDetails.CurrentCreditFacility")} {t("FacilityDetails.Refi1")} {t("FacilityDetails.Refi2")} {t("FacilityDetails.CurrentStatus")} {t("FacilityDetails.Comments")}
); }; export default FacilityDetails;
